name: Zones
description: Access information about Chatter Answers zones in your organization. Zones organize questions into logical groups, with each zone having its own focus and unique questions.

getzone(string,string).name: getZone
getzone(string,string).signature: public static ConnectApi.Zone getZone(String communityId, String zoneId)

getzones(string,integer,integer).name: getZones
getzones(string,integer,integer).signature: public static ConnectApi.ZonePage getZones(String communityId, Integer pageParam, Integer pageSize)

searchinzone(string,string,string,connec.name: searchInZone
searchinzone(string,string,string,connec.signature: public static ConnectApi.ZoneSearchPage searchInZone(String communityId, String zoneId, String q, ConnectApi.ZoneSearchResultType filter)
searchinzone(string,string,string,connec.description: Search articles or questions in a zone.

searchinzone(string,string,string,connec.name: searchInZone
searchinzone(string,string,string,connec.signature: public static ConnectApi.ZoneSearchPage searchInZone(String communityId, String zoneId, String q, ConnectApi.ZoneSearchResultType filter, String pageParam, Integer pageSize)
searchinzone(string,string,string,connec.description: Search a page of articles or questions in a zone.

searchinzone(string,string,string,connec.name: searchInZone
searchinzone(string,string,string,connec.signature: public static ConnectApi.ZoneSearchPage searchInZone(String communityId, String zoneId, String q, ConnectApi.ZoneSearchResultType filter, String language)
searchinzone(string,string,string,connec.description: Search articles or questions in a zone, and specify the language of the results.

settestsearchinzone(string,string,string.name: setTestSearchInZone
settestsearchinzone(string,string,string.signature: public static void setTestSearchInZone(String communityId, String zoneId, String q, ConnectApi.ZoneSearchResultType filter, ConnectApi.ZoneSearchPage result)
settestsearchinzone(string,string,string.description: Register a ConnectApi.ZoneSearchPage object to be returned when searchInZone(communityId, zoneId, q, filter) is called in a test context. Use the method with the same parameters or you receive an exception.

settestsearchinzone(string,string,string.name: setTestSearchInZone
settestsearchinzone(string,string,string.signature: public static void setTestSearchInZone(String communityId, String zoneId, String q, ConnectApi.ZoneSearchResultType filter, String language, ConnectApi.ZoneSearchPage result)
